bookTitle: Around the World in Eighty Days
bookAuthors: Jules Verne, Michael Glencross, Brian W. Aldiss
plot: One night in the reform club, Phileas Fogg bets his companions that he can travel across the globe in just eighty days. Breaking the well-established routine of his daily life, he immediately sets off for Dover with his astonished valet Passepartout. Passing through exotic lands and dangerous locations, they seize whatever transportation is at hand—whether train or elephant—overcoming set-backs and always racing against the clock.
characters: Fix, Phileas Fogg, Jean Passepartout, Aouda
setting: Suez Canal Bombay Calcutta Hong Kong Yokohama San Francisco Bay, California New York State Liverpool, England Singapore City London, England
